meanings.definition: A person who makes a declaration.
meanings.sent1: The declarants signed the legal document.
meanings.sent2: The declarants stated their opinions clearly.
meanings.sent3: The declarants had a contest to see who could shout the loudest declaration.
meanings.sent4: The declarants were like bold knights announcing their intentions.
meanings.sent5: The declarants stood tall, each one ready to speak their truth.

meanings.sent1: The group of declarants gathered to share their statements.
meanings.sent2: The declarants submitted their forms to the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The declarants formed a band and sang their statements in harmony.
meanings.sent4: The declarants were a flock of birds, each one chirping their own tune.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with declarants, each one adding a unique voice to the conversation.
